name: The Matchstick
description:
This is not a horror game.

Press A/D to move left and right. Press SPACE bar to jump. Press the left SHIFT key to light the match. Press R to restart the level.

It's a little bit hard. I estimate that it takes 15~30 min to finish the game. 

I'll be adding an introduction to the game on this page shortly, including sources for the assets I use, sorry it's empty right now.
